about_the_game:
Is life full of infinite pressure and helplessness, but nowhere to vent
Is reality filled with countless injustices and grievances, yet nowhere to confide in

Come to this virtual world and release yourself!

This is a destruction simulator where you can freely destroy items, release stress, and make judgments about unfair things in the game
Do whatever you want, release your suppressed inner self

This is a small simulation game with a total duration of about 1 hour

Gameplay:

Players can freely destroy various items in the town, including furniture, cars, public facilities, etc., to release stress and emotions.
At the same time, players can also choose to help small town residents solve their problems, such as judging unfair events, rescuing the little sister, and resolving conflicts with neighbors.
By helping the residents in the town, players can unlock more special items.
There are also some hidden tasks and bizarre events in the game that encourage players to explore and discover.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5800X / Intel Core i7-12700
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 GB VRAM, AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT / Nvidia GeForce RTX 3070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space
